review: You'll need a fast internet connection, a free HDMI port and a power outlet.We "cut the cord" 14 months ago and regretted losing access to some programming.The FireStick TV has removed all regret. We will never go back to cable and those  $120 per month bills.If you are a cord cutter or just seeking alternate sources of programming, this little device is a giant leap in the right direction.
author: M. Sanders

review: The Fire TV Stick is very simple to install and very simple to use.  The HDMI extension cord works very well as a WiFi antenna, i.e. you save yourself money because you don't need any HDMI cord.  I like to see Amazon have more FREE apps for the Fire TV Stick.
